name: TsumTsumMiniGolf
description:
This is a very basic, 1 level mini golf game done for the SteveTonyGames2021

Prompt: TsumTsum, In Space, make use of knowledge/skill from your  field/study/hobby other than your usual fandom transformative kind of work

This great tutorial helped me develope the game system. The minigolf tracks and ball model are from Kenney here.

The enviroment, other models and lighting are made by me. Roughly 10hours work.

--------

NOTE: If you get stuck or fall out of the track, please restart the game. Have fun!
